definitions: in a way that relates to the whole world

examples.text: the city is globally renowned for its artists

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to whole world

definitions: in a way that relates to the whole of something

examples.text: they do not often go into all the little fine detail; they look at it globally

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to whole of something

definitions: in a way that operates or applies through the whole of a file, program, etc.

examples.text: the processing can be applied globally to all digital output signals

shortDefinitions: in way that operates or applies through whole of file, program, etc.
